name: Visitas on-line
author: Nelson DÃ­az

sections.description:
Make a record of all the pages requested by an IP, also attaching Country, time of registration and where it came from.

Support

If you find any bug, have a question or need a new feature, please post a short comment at the support forum. We will come back to you as soon as possible.
sections.installation:
1. Upload ‘On-line Visits’ to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Done!
sections.faq:
I can see the ip of those who dress me

Each visit is recorded with the following data: ip, page visited, day and time, country and reference where it came from.
sections.changelog:
1.0.0

  • First stable version of the plugins
  • fixed some bugs in the definition of internal variables.
